group_1.textRight: Whaa?

group_1.textLeft: ...The world’s time was stopped!?

group_1.textRight: Yeah... That’s what I think.
This is a log... recording all sorts of signals that leak @out from the Wishing Star.

group_1.textLeft: The heck is this? I can’t read it, can’tcha just explain.

group_1.textRight: ...Umm.
...After Hibiki-san sent the message to the Three @Magi
and about when Nanase-san saw the light,
every single signal from that side became discontinuous...

group_1.textLeft: Hoh? What does that mean?

group_1.textRight: It’s as unnatural as if time had simply flown away.
For example, it’s like a song was suddenly broken @off mid-way,
and a completely different melody started...
Something like that happens in an instant.

group_1.textLeft: Like the instant we brought up before?

group_1.textRight: Yes... It all matches up.
It’s as if in that instant, the world where the Three Magi... where the angels live
skipped a little into the future.
Ahh, in other words, at that time,
Meguru and everyone else’s times were stopped?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.

group_1.textRight: Um... I
may perchance have gotten a glimpse of evidence @for that.

group_1.textLeft: ...Evidence?

group_1.textRight: Yes... During the time I was unconscious.

group_1.narration: {Then will you decide what to do,}
{as one of the Three Magi who created this world?}
{Until Ui has sorted out her feelings, @I’ll be stopping “Little Vacation’s” time.}

group_1.textLeft: You heard the Three Magi's conversation...?

group_1.textRight: Yes... I was thinking it was something like an @auditory hallucination...
But everyone said you had a feeling you lost consciousness
and it agrees with Miyabi-san’s explanation...

group_1.textLeft: What’s “Little Vacation”...?

group_1.textRight: Something like... the name of this world?

group_1.textLeft: I see... I think Hibiki-san’s voice did reach the Three Magi.
Eh?
Ya change topics way too fast!

group_1.textRight: How... How can that be?

group_1.textLeft: Sorry... I just don’t think this can be a coincidence.
Um... We all lost consciousness
after sending the signal to the Wishing Star... right?
If that was the reason behind the unnatural phenomenon,
then maybe our communications... were @unexpected for the Three Magi.
...Hey, Hagumun.

group_1.textRight: Eh... Yeah?

group_1.textLeft: This is just a hypothetical...
But if we were raising fish in an aquarium...
and those fish banded together and caused some unforeseen situation,
what would we do...?

group_1.textRight: Umm... Well...
...First we would discuss it with everyone, I guess?
It’d be like, “The referees are discussing next steps!”

group_1.textLeft: What if it was so urgent we couldn’t leave it alone @for even a second...?

group_1.textRight: ...Then for the time being, we would enact @emergency protocols to buy some time... correct?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, I get it now!
The aquarium fish in this scenario are us
and their caretakers are the Three Magi!
For the sake of buying time to talk, they stopped @the aquarium’s time...
Our world’s time, in other words?

group_1.textRight: Yeah... I think the Magi would have that power.
Do you know... of the “Great Void”?

group_1.textLeft: We heard of it at Library Town! That was when time @was turned back yeah?
That’s what Kako and them said!

group_1.textRight: Yeah... I think the Three Magi’s power is enough to @stop time.
Because Nanase-san was brought into the system’s barrier,
maybe that’s why she saw the precursor light...
And then... slightly afterwards... we were all @frozen.
Then I heard the Magi’s voices through...?

group_1.textLeft: Perhaps over there, their signals can be directly received...?
That labyrinth... seems to be a space within the @system.
Therefore... when in the labyrinth...
you essentially become a part of the system...

group_1.textRight: That barrier was that dangerous a place!?

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha... [chara:120301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:120301:cheek_0][chara:120301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:120301:lipSynch_1]But I understand now!
A short while ago, before Yukika-chan returned,
when we were wondering if our message was @actually delivered...

group_1.textRight: Although... I’m curious about...

group_1.textLeft: At that time, Shigure-chan was going to say
if our voices properly carried over,

perhaps the abnormality happened due to that...@[chara:120301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:120301:motion_200][chara:120301:cheek_0][chara:120301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:120301:lipSynch_1]Does that sound about right?

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah.
